scheduled_maintenances.name: [WAW][OVHcloud Connect ] - Change the title according to impacted services

incident_updates.body: Start time : 31/10/2022 22:30 UTC End time : 01/11/2022 02:30 UTC Service impact : Micro cut-off potential on the OCC links Service improvement : objective of maintenance is to standardise the network configuration of backbone equipment.
The scheduled maintenance has been postponed. Here is the new scheduled : Start time : 02/11/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 02/11/2022 15:00 UTC

Start time : 31/10/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 31/10/2022 15:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on the cooling system tank.
Start time : 02/11/2022 07:00 UTC End time : 03/11/2022 16:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance will be to power up electrical transformers.

Start time : 02/11/2022 08:00 UTC End time : 02/11/2022 09:00 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement : In order to optimise the network traffic on our backbone, we carry out multiple operations on different ovhcloud sites

Start time : 02/11/2022 08:10 UTC End time : 03/11/2022 16:11 UTC Service impact : None Service improvement :The objective of this maintenance is to update our electrical installation in order to bring it up to standard.

Start time : 03/11/2022 13:00 UTC End time : 03/11/2022 14:00 UTC Service impact : For SNC customers who have not correctly configured the two active IPsec VPNs on two different VPNGWs, there will be an interruption of IP traffic between the SNC site and the customer site through the IPsec tunnel for the duration of the maintenance. Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be updating our network equipment.
